title: Poster, 1971
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
signed: In pencil lower left on black area under image, illegible signature. Dated '71
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: A large capital Letter "M" constructed with bright yellow, orange and pink interlocking rectangles resembling the child's construction game "lego." The central brightly colored letter is shown against a solid black background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, 1971.
1971. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-182.
